medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient admitted with osteomyelitis after surgery for an ingrown nail of the right first toe.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: After the surgery, wound healing was delayed for over a month, with wound disruption and skin necrosis occurring.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient has a smoking history of more than 20 packs per year.
medical_history.social_history: Smoking history of more than 20 packs per year.
